title: FilterSet
description: This element represents a FilterSet that was used for the acquisition of this Channel. A Filter Set is typically composed of one Excitation Filter, one Emission Filter and a Dichroic. They might either be pre-assembled by the Manufacturer and purchased as a whole or they can be custom assembled on site depending on the needs of the user.

subCategoriesOrder.FilterSet: This element represents a FilterSet that was used for the acquisition of this Channel. A Filter Set is typically composed of one Excitation Filter, one Emission Filter and a Dichroic. subCategoriesOrder.ExcitationFilter: This field refers to an available Excitation Filter which is part of this Filter Cube.
subCategoriesOrder.StandardDichroic: This field refers to an available Dichroic Mirror which is part of this Filter Cube.
subCategoriesOrder.EmissionFilter: This field refers to an available Emission Filter which is part of this Filter Cube.
